title: 김동준 교수， Microsoft Young Professorship Winner 로 선정
content:
전산학과 김동준 교수님께서 Microsoft Young Professorship Winner 로 선정되셨습니다.
" The Young professorship award recognizes young faculty members who have exceptional talent and potential to advance the state of art in computing research field, and who demonstrate significant leadership quality in their research area. "
축하드립니다.
